title: Pessat seat to kcet seat
content: anyone who converted their pessat seat to kcet seat, what's the process?? like do I have to download challan and all...any help would be appreciated, thanks

comments.body: You should visit the admin office with your parents. It's not that complicated of a process. A friend of mine recently changed his seat..

I have done this,  You'll have to cancel your pessat seat first then only will they let you convert to kcet .... contact RR campus front office and they'll tell you what to do (also take a printout of the pessat/jee surrender document , it's really important)
Wdym it ain't complicated bruh , it literally took me the whole ass day and they didn't even give me attendance ðŸ˜­
It just took u a whole ass day.
